title: China the Dragon Smith the Second Chance

metadata.Plot: The Second Chance is a vivid documentary showcasing the life of China The Dragon Smith, a two time Heavyweight Boxing World Champion, who stepped away from boxing after four losses and went on to build a non profit sports program for underprivileged children. Now he is making a comeback for another shot at the Heavyweight World Champion Title. China Smith's childhood, teenage challenges, setbacks and unending support of family, friends and mentors are revealed in this moving story of a Hometown Hero, a Champion who will not abandon his dream. Narrated by his childhood friend, the world renowned Nik Wallenda, this film appeals to all who recognize the power of persistence. Bonus ending includes Music Video - Victorious.
metadata.Director: Lori Collins, Ron Klineschmidt, Ray Rodriguez
metadata.Actors: Nik Wallenda, China Smith Sr., John O'Keefe, Victoria Pompey
